name: Wyethia

Head: Dizzy
Nervous, uneasy, depressed
Sharp pain in forehead
Rush of blood to head
Respiratory: Tendency to get hoarse talking or singing; throat hot, dry
Dry, hacking cough, caused by tickling of the epiglottis
Burning sensation in the bronchial tubes
Stomach: Belching of wind alternating with hiccough
Back: Pain in back; extends to end of spine
Abdomen: Pain below ribs of right side
Fever: Chill at eleven am thirst for ice-water during chill
Mouth: Feels as if scalded; sensation of heat down oesophagus
Female: Pain in uterus; could outline its contour
Pain in left ovary, shooting down to knee
Throat: Dry, posterior nares; no relief from clearing
Throat feels swollen; epiglottis dry and burning
Extremities: Pain right arm, stiffness of wrist and hand

details: Has marked effects on the throat, and has proven an excellent remedy in PHARYNGITIS, especially the follicular form. Irritable throats of singers and public speakers. Useful also in hemorrhoids. Hay-fever symptoms; ITCHING IN POSTERIOR NARES.
